documentation.title: Add READMEs for Core Services
documentation.description: Create comprehensive README files for the integration-service and analytics-dashboard, including setup instructions and API documentation.
documentation.rationale: Essential for developer onboarding and maintaining the services at scale.

documentation.title: Document Error Codes and Troubleshooting
documentation.description: Create a centralized TROUBLESHOOTING.md guide that documents common error codes and their resolutions.
documentation.rationale: Reduces support burden and helps operators resolve production issues faster.

documentation.title: Create End-to-End Governance Workflow Examples
documentation.description: Develop a tutorial showing a complete policy lifecycle from creation to enforcement and audit logging.
documentation.rationale: Practical examples help developers understand how to integrate the platform into their own workflows.

documentation.title: Add Architecture Diagrams to Documentation
documentation.description: Create C4 or Mermaid diagrams for all major services and their interactions.
documentation.rationale: Visualizations improve high-level understanding of system design and data flows.
